title: determinvim
description: A Neovim configuration written in Nix using nvf.

title: Goldbach's Conjecture Solver
description: A Rust program that attempts to solve Goldbach's Conjecture, which states that every even integer greater than 2 can be expressed as the sum of two prime numbers.

title: DM Helper
description: A D&D management Discord bot written in Rust using Poise.

title: Hangul Recognition
description: A web application written in Vue.js to help Korean learners master Hangul.

title: Mandarin Tone Recognition
description: A web application written in Svelte to help Mandarin learners differentiate vowel tones.
